title.rendered: The job offer scam that has alerted the Civil Guard

content.rendered:
04/28/2022

Act at 11:53 CEST

To find a job is one of the concerns of many Spaniards. It is something known and unfortunately used by scammers, as has recently been seen in a new case of phishing that is already running through the networks.

phishing It is a scam that aims to obtain private user data through the Internet, especially to access your accounts or bank details. This time, in the form of a job offer.

⚠️ #ALERT ❗
Detected SMS of job offers with very advantageous conditions. The objective is to obtain information in order to use it to carry out new frauds or involve users in illegal activities, such as muleteers. #NoPiques https://t.co/ok23DthlTC pic.twitter.com/r8farlVAHN

– Civil Guard 🇪🇸 (@guardiacivil) April 18, 2022

“Enjoy a I work part time earning between 100 and 300 dollars a day! It is easy. No special knowledge is required. Easy registration” says the sms that has several versions with similar offers.

What is there to do? Very easy. The first thing is to completely ignore the message without entering the link they provide us and the second is not to share it, preventing the chain of transmission from spreading among our acquaintances.
